price: Nếu TA muốn, TA có thể làm cho nó trở nên mặn. Vậy sao các ngươi không biết ơn (TA)?
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Vietnamese translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Vietnamese by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
